Key: Sorry, Miku. I just want to rest.
And besides, I need to think about that question.

Are you really? But our relationship is totally
lovey-dovey, so what we have must be it!
Uh... But how would you explain that feeling?

Well～ Darling, whenever I'm stressed about
something, you think things through with me. And
when I feel stuck, you take a new step with me.
It was out of love, right?!
Well, I guess you have something there.

If you were having troubles with your afterschool
club or anything, and if I were your senior, I
would probably come up with a resolution with you.
I see. That was really helpful.
No problem at all. Anything for you, darling!

But still, that's not much of an answer...
Hmm, so hard...
